Description_lang: A sleek and elongated body that effortlessly navigates the waters of Khaz Algar. Much larger in size compared to it's cousin, the Bismuth Bitterling, this ancient fish tends to follow schools of this fish in an effort to absorb nutrients dislodged by the fish.|cnGREEN_FONT_COLOR:Special:|r$@spellicon456586 PerceptionToss this fish back in the water and increase your Khaz Algar Perception.|cnGREEN_FONT_COLOR:Areas you can find this fish:|R- Isle of Dorn- The Ringing Deeps- Siren Isle|cnGREEN_FONT_COLOR:Fishing Pools:|r- Glimmerpool
